sections.heading: Actions to seek court approval by parents during marriageDuring the marriage of a minor's parents, an action to seek court approval to alienate, encumber, or lease the property of the minor, incur an obligation of the minor, or compromise a claim of the minor may be brought in the domicile of the mi
sections.text: Actions to seek court approval by parents during marriageDuring the marriage of a minor's parents, an action to seek court approval to alienate, encumber, or lease the property of the minor, incur an obligation of the minor, or compromise a claim of the minor may be brought in the domicile of the minor, or if the parents seek to compromise a claim of the minor in a pending action, in that action.Acts 2015, No. 260, ยง2, eff. Jan. 1, 2016.
